name: pnp-list-formatting-profile-card
title: User Profile Card
shortDescription: This is simple user profile card built to provide a tile view with contact buttons. A default image is shown if a picture is not provided.
longDescription: This is simple user profile card built to provide a tile view with contact buttons. A default image is shown if a picture is not provided.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
